content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Use-case: Smelting basic materials.
Consists of:
– Stone Furnace (position: (0.0, 0.0)) [warning: no ingredients to smelt]
– Iron Chest (position: (1.5, 0.5))

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (–16.0, –51.0)
Use-case: Extraction and preliminary processing of iron ore.
Consists of:
– Burner Mining Drill (position: (–16.0, –51.0)) [status: NO_FUEL]
– Burner Inserter (position: (–14.5, –49.5)) [status: NO_FUEL]
– Transport Belt (located at approximately (–15.5, –49.5)) with direction DOWN
– Iron Chest (position: (–13.5, –49.5))
– Intermediate Transport Belt (located at approximately (–15.5, –47.5)) with direction UP
– Burner Inserter (position: (–14.5, –47.5)) [status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS]
– Iron Chest (position: (–13.5, –47.5))
(Note: Belt connectivity remains stable as confirmed in recent logs.)

### Copper Furnace at position (–27.0, –60.0)
Use-case: Processing copper ore.
Consists of:
– Stone Furnace (position: (–27.0, –60.0)) [warning: no ingredients to smelt]

### Lab Power Integration System at position (0.5, 2.5)
Use-case: Supporting research through integrated power and fluid supply.
Consists of:
– Lab (position: (0.5, 2.5)) [status: NO_POWER]
– Offshore Pump (position: (–7.5, 25.5)) [warning: no fluid present in connections; status: NOT_CONNECTED]
– Boiler (position: (2.0, 17.5)) [warnings: no input liquid, no fluid present in connections; status: NOT_CONNECTED]
– Steam Engine (position: (5.5, 5.5)) [warnings: not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections; status: NOT_CONNECTED]

### Pipe Production Facility at position (3.5, 0.5)
Use-case: Manufacturing of pipes.
Consists of:
– Assembling Machine (position: (3.5, 0.5)) [warnings: not receiving electricity; cannot create pipe due to missing resource: iron-plate; status: NO_POWER]
– Iron Chest (position: (1.5, 0.5))
– Electricity network via Small Electric Poles arranged around positions such as (3.5, –1.5) (among others)

### Fluid Pipelines (Pipe Groups)
Use-case: Interconnecting fluid transport components.
Consists of multiple PipeGroups detected over several clusters:
• Cluster A (around (8.5, 5.5)): PipeGroups with fluid_system identifiers 119048 and 119900 (status: EMPTY).
• Cluster B (around (10.5, 4.5)–(10.5, 9.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119049, 119901, and 119908 (status: EMPTY).
• Cluster C (around (–9.5, 9.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119052 and 119904 carrying water (WORKING).
• Cluster D (around (2.5, 9.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119055 and 119623 (status: EMPTY).
• Cluster E (around (1.5, 11.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119061, 119486, and 119629 (status: EMPTY).
• Cluster F (around (–1.5, 17.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119072, 119214, 119356, 119498, and 119924 (status: EMPTY).
• Cluster G (around (6.5, 16.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119075, 119216, 119359, 119500, and 119927 (status: EMPTY).
• Cluster H (around (–1.5, 21.5)): PipeGroups with identifiers 119076, 119221, 119360, 119505, and 119928 (status: EMPTY).
• Additional groups include a PipeGroup with fluid_system 119477 at (3.5, 9.5) and one with fluid_system 119495 at (10.5, 8.5).
(All newly detected groups remain empty except those explicitly transporting water.)

### Integrated Components
Use-case: Facilitate power distribution and link mined resources.
Consists of:
– Belt connections linking components of the Iron Ore Mining Setup:
  • Belt at (–15.5, –49.5) [direction: DOWN]
  • Belt at (–15.5, –47.5) [direction: UP]
– Electricity Network:
  • ElectricityGroup (id: 36929) connecting Small Electric Poles at positions such as (3.5, –1.5), (3.5, –2.5), (7.5, 0.5), (3.5, 2.5), (4.5, 3.5), and (6.5, 3.5)
   (Voltage remains 0, indicating the network is inactive.)

────────────────────────
ERROR TIPS
• PipeGroup and Fluid Connectivity Issues
  – Multiple PipeGroups remain empty and fail to provide active fluid flow.
   Tip: Verify candidate existence and spatial alignment; select a PipeGroup with suitable connectivity (e.g., one at (–1.5, 17.5)) when establishing connections.
• Burner Mining Drill Fuel Shortage
  – The Burner Mining Drill at (–16.0, –51.0) is out of fuel, halting ore extraction.
   Tip: Refill fuel before commencing further extraction operations.
• Assembling Machine Resource and Power Issues
  – The Assembling Machine at (3.5, 0.5) is not receiving electricity and is missing the required iron-plate.
   Tip: Supply the missing iron-plate and reinforce power connections.
• Power Generation and Fluid Supply Connection Issues
  – The Boiler and Steam Engine continue to lack proper fluid input and network integration.
   Tip: Validate fluid input sources and secure robust connectivity for both power and liquid supply.
• Inactive Electricity Network
  – The ElectricityGroup (id: 36929) remains at 0 voltage despite connections.
   Tip: Integrate small electric poles more effectively to establish an active power network.

────────────────────────
NAMESPACE
• get_entity(entity: Any, position: Any) -> Any  
  – Retrieves an entity of the specified type at the given position.
   • Success: Returns the located entity.
   • Failure: Raises an exception if the entity is not found.
• pipe_entity(pipe: entities.Pipe) -> Any  
  – Processes a pipe entity during pipeline connection routines.
• rotate_entity(entity: Any, direction: Any) -> Any  
  – Rotates the given entity to the specified direction for proper alignment.
• insert_item(resource: Any, target: Any, quantity: int) -> Any  
  – Inserts a specified quantity of a resource into the target inventory.
• get_connection_amount(virtual_candidate: Any, boiler_connection: Any, pipe_proto: Prototype.Pipe) -> int  
  – Calculates the number of pipe segments required to establish a fluid connection.

Important Variables:
• pump_working (OffshorePump) – Holds the offshore pump entity at position (–7.5, 25.5).
• boiler_original (Boiler) – Represents the boiler entity at position (2.0, 17.5).
• candidate_intermediate_offpump (Position) – Candidate connection point for linking the Offshore Pump.
• candidate_intermediate_boiler (Position) – Candidate connection point for linking the Boiler.
• boiler_connection_point (Position) – Intended connection point for the boiler’s water supply.
• steam_engine_connection_point (Position) – Intended connection point for the Steam Engine’s input.
• pipe_count (int) – Tracks the current number of available pipes.
• distance (float) – Calculated distance for pipeline segments.
• final_inventory (Inventory) – Snapshot of inventory item counts after recent operations.
• virtual_candidate (Position) – Virtual candidate connection point used for manual pipe placement.
